text: Mitteilungen der Altorientalischen Gesellschaft, often abbreviated MAOG, is a German magazine on the art of the Near East, published in Leipzig. It is often referenced in works related to Near-Eastern art. The magazine was founded in 1925. ==References== Category:Magazines published in Germany Category:German- language magazines Category:Mass media in Leipzig Category:1925 establishments in Germany Category:Magazines established in 1925
title: MAOG
